name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Skilled Android Security Engineer with over 13 years of full stack development experience in high-performance applications within healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in mobile security, reverse engineering, and troubleshooting, with a strong emphasis on understanding vulnerabilities, exploits, and firmware. Adept at coding in **Java** and leveraging **C**/**C++** for security solutions. Experienced in using tools like **Frida**, **Ida**, and **Ghindra** for in-depth analysis and reverse engineering of mobile applications.

In addition to security expertise, I possess hands-on skills in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** for versatile application development. Proven track record in AI/ML-powered platform development for predictive analytics and real-time processing, alongside deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**. Familiar with aligning solutions with compliance standards including HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2, while also having a solid background in MLOps using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
